comment.author: 33913611@N07
comment._content: Oh, I know this one -- it's across from Mayor Bloomberg's house.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Google street view of East 79th street near Fifth Avenue looks like it. maps.google.com/maps?q=east+79th+and+fifth+avenue&ll=... Evening public ledger., September 09, 1915, Final, Page 2 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045211/1915-09-09/ed-... reports that Mrs Elizabeth Griggs Nichols died the previous night during a robbery at her "palatial home at 5th Avenue and East 79th street" Found because JE Piper's clue leads to 17 East 79th St. www.nytimes.com/2009/02/25/nyregion/25bloomberg.html?_r=2...; also palatial according to the NYT article, see Google street view maps.google.com/maps?q=east+79th+and+fifth+avenue&ll=... with the policeman at the door.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The Times' account is very colorful.."An inside job beyond doubt:" said Inspector Fauret, "and very cleverly done." query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F50F16FA385B17738...
